info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 4:59PM EDT until June 26 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Litchfield County in northern Connecticut... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 458 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Litchfield, or 10 miles southwest of Torrington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Litchfield around 505 PM EDT. Northwest Harwinton around 520 PM EDT. Torrington around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include South Norfolk, West Torrington, Torringford, Grappaville, Haight Vineyard, Nepaug, Kelly Corner, West Goshen, Wrightville and Tyler Lake Heights. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
